npc:
So you are our
new 'immortal
one'.

I am so sorry.
No one should
deserve that...
honor.

When the world
ends, what will
happen to us
Will we just...
die?

I am not sure
if I even want
to know.
chest:
You obtain a
pair of
"RUNNING BOOTS"!

Hold down arrow
while on air
and press X to
dive. Hitting
the ground causes
a quake.

You can use this
skill to break
blocks and stun
enemies.

You obtain a
"ENDLESS BAG
OF PEBBLES"!

Press C to throw
them. They
never end!

You obtain a
pair of
"TINY WINGS"!

Press and hold
X after jumping
to flap your
arms and mimic
flying.

It does not make
you fly, though,
just fall
more slowly.

Press X after the
first jump to
perform a double
jump.
